nodes.text: Trouble on Tatooine is a Star Wars World of Reading title set at Level 2. It was released by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on May 2, 2017, it is a retelling of the early events involving Luke Skywalker from Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope
A stylized retelling with stickers of how Luke Skywalker met R2-D2, C-3PO, and Obi-Wan Kenobi in Star Wars: A New Hope.
